resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105889</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105889</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101358</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">History's Warming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmen Der Geschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Chauffage de l'Histoire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aquecer-se Do History</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riscaldamento Della Storia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέρμανση ιστορίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Calentarse De la Historia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An ancient global warming episode drastically changed the planet. Life on Earth needed 200,000 years to recover. What we're headed for in the next century could be even bigger.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine alte globale wärmende Episode änderte 
drastisch den Planeten. Das Leben auf Masse benötigte 200.000 
Jahre wieder herzustellen. Was uns für in das folgende 
Jahrhundert vorangegangen werden, konnten sogar grösser sein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un épisode de chauffage global antique a 
rigoureusement changé la planète. La vie sur terre a eu besoin
de 200.000 ans pour récupérer. Ce que nous sommes dirigés 
pour en le siècle à venir pourrait être encore plus grand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um episode aquecendo-se global antigo mudou 
dràstica o planeta. A vida na terra necessitou 200.000 anos 
recuperar. O que nós somos dirigidos para no século seguinte 
poderia ser mesmo mais grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un episodio di riscaldamento globale antico 
drasticamente ha cambiato il pianeta. La vita su terra ha avuto 
bisogno di 200.000 anni di recuperare. Che cosa capo per nel 
secolo venturo potrebbe essere ancora più grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα αρχαίο σφαιρικό επεισόδιο θέρμανσης άλλαξε 
δραστικά τον πλανήτη. Η ζωή στη γη χρειάστηκε 200.000 
έτη που ανακτούν. Τι διευθυνόμαστε για στον επόμενο αιώνα 
θα μπορούσε να είναι ακόμα μεγαλύτερος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un episodio que se calentaba global antiguo cambió
drástico el planeta. La vida en la tierra necesitó 200.000 
años recuperarse. Qué nos dirigen hacia en el siglo próximo 
podría ser incluso más grande.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SCRIPPS INSTITUTION OF OCEANOGRAPHY
FN:SCRIPPS INSTITUTION OF OCEANOGRAPHY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101358</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105889</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/history-s-warming</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
